pullRequest.title: Added Junit tests in commons/util and commons/setting packages
pullRequest.bodyText:
Added Junit tests in commons module:
util package:
ClassUtil class
KapuaFileUtils class
SemanticVersion class
StringUtil class
setting package:
AbstractKapuaSetting class
EnvFriendlyConfiguration class
KapuaSettingException class
SimpleSettingKey class
SystemSettingKey class
Signed-off-by: Sonja sonja.matic@comtrade.com
